description: [Premium Times] He also noted that not many people in South Africa believed in the team.
title: Africa: Afcon2023 - South Africa's Coach Speaks On Semi-Final Clash With Nigeria

description: [Premium Times] In Nigeria, the First Lady, Oluremi Tinubu, has advocated increased awareness campaigns against cancer.
title: Africa: World Cancer Day 2024 - WHO Releases Frightening Statistics

description: [Shabelle] Mogadishu, Somalia -- The rotation of the African Union force in Somalia was delayed by at least one month due to floods, as troops remained marooned in military bases that they were meant to leave more than four weeks ago after El Niño-induced rains submerged roads, and airstrips and cut off major supply routes of the Horn of Africa country, The EastAfrican has learned.
title: Africa: Floods Derail AU Mission Exit Plan in Somalia
Southern Africa: Communiqué From Africa CDC On the Southern Africa Development Community (SADC) Extra Ordinary Virtual Summit of Heads of State and Government On the Cholera Situation in the Region

description: [Africa CDC] Imagine a future where every child in Africa can get their vaccines on time and how disease outbreaks could be swiftly managed by locally produced vaccines and medicines. This future is not a distant dream but a tangible reality shaped by the Africa CDC to guarantee health security across the continent.
title: Africa: Revital Healthcare, Driving African Local Manufacturing of Medical Devices

description: [The New Humanitarian] Nairobi -- The UN-mandated deployment is aimed at reining in rampant gang violence, but many people in Kenya and Haiti fear it could make things worse.
title: Africa: Kenya, Haiti Leaders Look to Force Police Mission Through Despite Court Ruling

description: [Daily Trust] The Super Eagles of Nigeria are suddenly soaring at the ongoing Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) in Cote d' Ivoire and Nigerians are pleasantly surprised by the unexpected resurgence in the team. At the end of their opening match against Equatorial Guinea, only a few Nigerians believed the Super Eagles would survive the group stage. But today, the story is different as the rejuvenated Eagles didn't only progress from group A but soared high into the semi-finals.
title: Africa: A Fourth Afcon Title Loading for Super Eagles

description: [Premium Times] South Africa captain Williams was the hero, as he saved four of the five penalties to snag their first semifinal place in 24 years.
title: Africa: Afcon - Williams Is Hero As South Africa Book Semifinal Place Against Nigeria

description: [Vanguard] Twenty-four (24) years after Tijani Babangida's brace saw-off South Africa in their last Africa Cup of Nations semi-final appearance, both sides will meet again next Wednesday to decide one of the finalists for this year's AFCON.
title: Africa: Nigeria, South Africa to Meet in Repeat of Afcon 2000 Semi-Final

description: [Vanguard] Namibia's President Hage Geingob died early Sunday in a hospital in Windhoek, the presidential office said in a statement.
title: Africa: Namibia's President Hage Geingob Dies in Hospital

description: [Capital FM] Nairobi -- President William Ruto has phoned acting President of Namibia Dr. Nangolo Mbumba to extend condolences following the demise of President Hage Geingob.
title: Africa: President Ruto Phones Mbumba to Extend Condolences After Death of President Geingob
